div.head: 身乾黑瘦
div.div: the body is desiccated black and emaciated

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the body is desiccated black and emaciated

sense.def: Illness Sign of an emaciated body of dark color and desiccated skin. Wei sheng yi jian fang 衛生易簡方 5: 鼓脹，身乾 黑瘦，多渴煩悶 , “Drum distension. The body is desiccated , black and emaciated . One is often thirsty, with vexation and heart-pressure”.
